page.title: 14A DAY IN THE LIFE OF LYNDSEY
page.content: I get up at about 7.30am.and get my breakfast finished by 8.15am.By 8.30am I have all my school things ready and we leave in the car for school at 8.40am.School starts at 9.00 am and after assembly our first lesson is maths which lasts until 10.30am. After playtime when we often skip we do P.E. At 12.00 we go to dinner where I like having beefburger and chips and some fruit.At 1.15 when the bell goes we go in for afternoon school.In the afternoon we have History or Geography until 2.30pm when the bell goes for playtime .After that we do some English until 3.30pm when we are allowed to read until 3.45pm when the bell goes for the end of school.I then go out of school and wait until my mum comes to pick me up. That is a normal Tuesday at St.Bridgets Primary School.
